title: Google Application Engineer L3 | Need Advice
content:
I am expecting an offer from Google for Application Engineer L3 position. Need advice on if this is a good offer or is it worth to join Google for the lower pay. 

Company: Google
Title/Level: Application Engineer L3
Location: Bangalore/Hyd
Salary: 18-20L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 30K USD over 4 years ( 38 % first year)
Bonus: 15% of Salary ( ~3L)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 32L ( first year )


Current Company: US Startup ( Joined 1 month ago )
Title/Level: SDE 2 / Data Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 32L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 30K USD over 5 years ( ~ 5L )
Bonus: 10% of Salary ( ~3L)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 40L

title: Swiggy | SDET | Remote
content:
* Education: BTech, CSE Tier 1
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: SDE Intern at a start-up for 6 months
* Date of the Offer: May 2024
* Company: Swiggy
* Title/Level: SDET
* Location: Remote
* Salary: INR 800000
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 800000
